byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Groupon continued to respond to criticism over its financial disclosures, once again amending the regulatory filing for its highly anticipated public offering.
snippet: Groupon continued to respond to criticism over its financial disclosures, once again amending the regulatory filing for its highly anticipated public offering.

headline.main: Appeasing Critics, Groupon Revises I.P.O. Disclosure
